aka: 戈登，吉诺和弗莱德的圣诞大烤宴

cast.name: 弗雷德·西里埃克斯 Fred Sirieix

this_title: Gordon, Gino & Fred's Great Christmas Roast
trans_title: 戈登，吉诺和弗莱德的圣诞节
戈登，吉诺和弗莱德的圣诞大烤宴
introduction: In this festive special, chefs Gordon and Gino will lay on a spectacular banquet for the heroes in Britain. Working against the clock, they'll be assisted by a number of celebrities as the teams compete to serve the most impressive Christmas menu. Charming headwaiter Fred will not only be tasked with running the service but he'll be wrangling the results from our deserving diners.
chinese_title: 戈登，吉诺和弗莱德的圣诞节
foreign_title: Gordon, Gino & Fred's Great Christmas Roast
